title: Honey, I shrunk the kids movie poster.
author: cheetu

comments.content:
It looks close to a Futura Bold/Black variation but **[Flyer (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150423162712/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Elsner%2BFlake&ffam=FlyerEF%20-%20Bold&fid=66849613e8d71f762beea72f193aa01a&fsize=60&text=HONEY%20I%20SHRUNK%20THE%20KIDS&wrap=2)** looks even closer (because of /S)  
You should manually embolden & compress the font to make it fit your sample...
